description:
After creating a volume and then attaching it the value of "attached to" in volume-list is not populated.  The value in the attachments dict in volume-show does correctly display the instance id of attachment.

Steps:
Create volume
Create server, if needed.
attach volume to server
Run volume-list and see that attached to is not populate
Run volume-show and notice that the server_id is populated within the attachments dict.



ben@x200:~/Stackz/devstack$ nova volume-list
+----+--------+----------------+------+-------------+-------------+
| ID | Status |  Display Name  | Size | Volume Type | Attached to |
+----+--------+----------------+------+-------------+-------------+
| 1  | in-use | myvol-ab66f060 | 1    | None        | None        |
+----+--------+----------------+------+-------------+-------------+
ben@x200:~/Stackz/devstack$ nova volume-show 1
+---------------------+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
|       Property      |                                                       Value                                                        |
+---------------------+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| attachments         | [{u'device': u'/dev/vdg', u'server_id': u'74c78448-d29a-4e0e-a075-16c4269f4156', u'id': u'1', u'volume_id': u'1'}] |
| availability_zone   | nova                                                                                                               |
| created_at          | 2012-03-30 18:28:38                                                                                                |
| display_description | test volume: myvol-ab66f060                                                                                        |
| display_name        | myvol-ab66f060                                                                                                     |
| id                  | 1                                                                                                                  |
| metadata            | {}                                                                                                                 |
| size                | 1                                                                                                                  |
| snapshot_id         | None                                                                                                               |
| status              | in-use                                                                                                             |
| volume_type         | None                                                                                                               |
+---------------------+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
title: nova volume-list is not showing attached to value

comments.content:
After creating a volume and then attaching it the value of "attached to" in volume-list is not populated.  The value in the attachments dict in volume-show does correctly display the instance id of attachment.

Steps:
Create volume
Create server, if needed.
attach volume to server
Run volume-list and see that attached to is not populate
Run volume-show and notice that the server_id is populated within the attachments dict.



ben@x200:~/Stackz/devstack$ nova volume-list
+----+--------+----------------+------+-------------+-------------+
| ID | Status |  Display Name  | Size | Volume Type | Attached to |
+----+--------+----------------+------+-------------+-------------+
| 1  | in-use | myvol-ab66f060 | 1    | None        | None        |
+----+--------+----------------+------+-------------+-------------+
ben@x200:~/Stackz/devstack$ nova volume-show 1
+---------------------+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
|       Property      |                                                       Value                                                        |
+---------------------+--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| attachments         | [{u'device': u'/dev/vdg', u'server_id': u'74c78448-d29a-4e0e-a075-16c4269f4156', u'id': u'1', u'volume_id': u'1'}] |
| availability_zone   | nova                                                                                                               |
| created_at          | 2012-03-30 18:28:38                                                                                                |

comments.content: I made sure this worked with novaclient when I made the attribute formatting changes. Are you using latest novaclient?
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~bcwaldon

comments.content:
Heh - I ran into the same exact issue yesterday: https://bugs.launchpad.net/nova/+bug/968577

My code was out-of-date by a few days.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~sleepsonthefloor

comments.content:
My nova client was a few days out of date and it is working fine, sorry . I
need to check my startup job that was supposed to update every start.

Ben
